author: Johnny Harris
description:
Why the Mormon church is the richest in the world
Use code johnnyharris at the link below to get an exclusive 60% off an annual Incogni plan: https://incogni.com/johnnyharris

Join the Newpress waitlist to be part of what comes next: https://newpress.com

Check out all my sources for this video here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1W4AT_Cnx2ILBiv9oorrGfcvnWBxO1hM3fjmQwsLFm_c/edit?tab=t.0

The Mormons went from a small group of rebels in Utah to the 17 million person religion it is today. With $300 billion, it is now the richest religion per capita. This took a century of burying difficult truths and creating a unified fundamentalist belief that spans the world.

WATCH PART 1: https://youtu.be/hUW7j9GmXjI
WATCH PART 2: https://youtu.be/kieCFwMqKtE
